title: Drawing, "Design for Tapestry with Cat, Vase, Pitcher, and Fish"
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right:  tapestry/"cat"
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Seated cat surrounded with vase of flowers and fish bones (upper and lower left) and with pitcher and three fish (upper and lower right).

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Tapestry with Cat, Vase, Pitcher, and Fish".
Graphite on cream paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-85.
